text: Tumi laksya karaa na'ine allahe akasara paraa pani barsana karae, tara pichata seya bhumita prasrarana hicape prabahita karae tara pichata se'itora jaraiyate nana dharanara phacala utpanna karae, arasesata seya suka'i yaya. Phalata tumi se'i phacalaka haladhiya barnata dekhibalai poraa, sesata te'om se'itoka kherakutata parainata karae? Niscaya iyata upadesa ache bodhasakti sampanna byaktisakalara babe
